website_summaries.verdict: The ideal choice for customers wanting a simple stretch lid set at a cheaper cost.
pros: Safe for dishwasher, microwave, and freezer
Each lid stretches a couple inches, and the lids work well even when wet
cons: Some buyers claim the lids can become slippery when  taken out of fridge storage and immediately re-used

customer_reviews.title: Tore easily.
customer_reviews.text: Used less than a month and the lid tore completely around one of the circular lines as I was putting it on a jar.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Brennan

customer_reviews.title: Love these! They are relatively easy to put on ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these! They are relatively easy to put on and stick great. BUT they are quite hard to put back on once you take the dish it's on out of the fridge, due to the cold dish warming up the dish and silicone get slight condensation and it's quite slippery. So I just dry it off and leave it set out for a few minutes before trying again. I would recommend these, they are a great replacement for Saran wrap.
customer_reviews.author: RTCARRICO

customer_reviews.title: The silicone lids allow me to cook like that without using Aluminum foil
customer_reviews.text: They arrived on time and we put them to use right away. I primarily bought these to cover dishes that I'm cooking with in my Instant Pot Electric Pressure Cooker. The silicone lids allow me to cook like that without using Aluminum foil. Thanks for a forward-thinking product.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissie McP

customer_reviews.title: Overall a pretty good product
customer_reviews.text: Great idea, and it works pretty good but I find that after it’s in the refrigerator it is a lot harder to recover something. Like the cold does something to it’s elasticity? I’m sure after using it more I’ll get the hang of it. Once you get it on right it works really well right seal, you can turn it upside down and it won’t come off. Keeps my frosge from smelling like my leftovers!
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: These stretch and fit well on many items: bowls for the dog's meals, the top of the wine carafe, the end of a large cut vegetable. I don't like or need the long horseshoe-crab tails, so I simply cut them off.
customer_reviews.author: transponder

customer_reviews.title: Moth Balls
customer_reviews.text: They smelled so bad of moth balls I had to throw them away. They stunk up my whole kitchen. I tried to soak them in soap and water and it didn't help at all.
customer_reviews.author: Taryn

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: These don't really work that well for keeping things fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Dale

customer_reviews.title: It's cut down my use of plastic wrap enormously
customer_reviews.text: I find these fit most round containers quite well. At least as well, if not better, than plastic wrap which often doesn't stick to surfaces. It's not as tight as putting them in a tupperware-type container with a fitted lid, but there are many situations with leftovers in a bowl where I don't want to move the food out of the bowl, and these work quite well.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Messina

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase, wish it didn't get shipped in plastic though.
customer_reviews.text: I use this to cover my steel bowls in the fridge for leftovers, or for food prep. I also use it as a lid when I soak cashews to make nut milks. I hesitated to buy these because I thought I could get around using beeswax covers, but as far as duribility and length of lifespan on these vs. beeswrap, as well as ease of cleaning and spill security, I think these have it. Beeswax cannot be frozen, so these even have a use in the freezer.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra G

customer_reviews.title: Hard to use
customer_reviews.text: Whatever you use this with must be completely dry or it will slip off would not buy product again. A lot harder to use than expected
customer_reviews.author: Robert A Hill

customer_reviews.title: They are not easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I was looking forward to receiving these, but boy! they are not the easiest stretch cover to use. Trying to stretch them over a bowl only slightly larger that the cover ... well in the end I gave up As soon as I had one side positioned, stretching it to pull down on the opposite side meant that the first side of the cover moved and unsealed itself. I will go back to using cing film I think. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: susannah l.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Very bad quality. They dont stay on and keep coming off.
customer_reviews.author: SR

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product
customer_reviews.text: I find these practically useless! I had to use the largest one to cover a luncheon plate. Most of the time I am trying to cover something that's bigger than a 3 inch container. Wish I had not unpackaged them otherwise I would have returned them. Don't waste your time and money folks. I can buy a package of plastic elasticized covers in various sizes for $3.00 at Walmart and reuse them for a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Mass. RN

customer_reviews.title: They work!
customer_reviews.text: The first one I used was on a half of a watermelon. It stayed in place and kept it fresh in the fridge!! I saw an ad for these online and found the better price here on Amazon (with Prime free shipping), so decided to give them a try. Sure don't need plastic cling wrap anymore! Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: 3D

customer_reviews.title: Okay, but could be better for glass
customer_reviews.text: These lids work OK, but I found they tended to slip off larger glass bowls, once the moisture inside the refrigerator took effect. The small sizes work better, but I needed the large size to work on glass salad bowls.
customer_reviews.author: Dave 0194

customer_reviews.title: Great tight fit
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the silicone lids since they close tightly and prevents spills. I especially liked the smaller ones because they hug the canned products well. The only con I have if they are difficult to dry, so you have to turn it inside out and dry one side at a time, since I prefer to air dry them. Suggest you make a bundle of smaller lids and larger lids that can be ordered separately.
customer_reviews.author: Sabeth M

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Meh, not that impressed. They don’t fit any other shape than round. You get a bunch of diff sizes, but Good luck trying to match them perfectly to the size dishes you have. And once they or the dish surface gets wet—condensation—they have to dry off completely or they won’t stick. Not a complete waste of money because I can use a few of them but kinda a hassle.
customer_reviews.author: BWolf

customer_reviews.title: Great idea and they work until you want to reseal ...
customer_reviews.text: Great idea and they work until you want to reseal a bowl you've taken out of the refrigerator.....won't hold, slips off the rim. So only good if you plan to use all of what you've refrigerated.
customer_reviews.author: Donna K.

customer_reviews.title: Can not stay in place!! Not air tight!
customer_reviews.text: I would give this no star if I can! It slipped off the container! Not air tight! Bad product no use for it! Don’t wast you time!
customer_reviews.author: M.C. Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Yes! I like!
customer_reviews.text: I like these a lot. I use them mostly on all the glass storage containers I have that have had their plastic lids break. But also stretched over a half a cantaloupe once and over what was left on a dinner plate to be reheated later. Even on odd shaped bowls!
customer_reviews.author: A. McCumber

customer_reviews.title: good replacement for pyrex lids
customer_reviews.text: Not leakproof (if it falls on its side in the fridge) but otherwise works well. great option for pyrex glass dishes that no longer have the plastic lid they came with or basic crockery that you serve in but maybe doesn't have a lid. Not easy to clean, but the versatility outweighs this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: good idea
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Even seals odd shaped containers, i.e.; crock with handle and square cake pan. You must use the next largest lid though.
customer_reviews.author: Mili

customer_reviews.title: Functional but not quite air tight
customer_reviews.text: Pros - Great variety in sizes. Dishwasher safe Con - doesn't quite give an airtight fit so watch out with using it on containers with liquids or leftovers that have a strong smell. Not sure if I would buy these again - perhaps may test with other vendors since I do really like the idea.
customer_reviews.author: magnolia

customer_reviews.title: Too bad you can’t pick and buy the sizes you want
customer_reviews.text: They work well but difficult to stretch Over bowl without spilling. I wish you could pick out the size you want because I really needed the large ones for salad bowls and such and the small ones for open cans. The ones in between I can’t seem to find a use for.
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: When in a hurry no worries just “Stretch it” and it will “Seal It”!
customer_reviews.text: What an amazing use for lids when you can’t find where everyone else has thrown all the ones that are supposed to fit! These are perfect to adjust to different sizes an don’t leak! Yep it “Seals it” I can just say wow! I have either bottoms with no lids or lids with no bottoms well this just made it a lot easier to clean those cubbies out.
customer_reviews.author: Annabelle Lee

customer_reviews.title: Ripped on first use
customer_reviews.text: The small one ripped on first use. I think that one was defective. I just want a replacement for that one.
customer_reviews.author: RINA BARRY

customer_reviews.title: Ripped
customer_reviews.text: They are great except the smallest one ripped about 3 weeks after I got it. Only after maybe 5-8 uses.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Brehm

customer_reviews.title: A handy and versatile item to keep food fresh
customer_reviews.text: The various sizes allow for a multitude of uses: one can cover a can of soup or beans, another a cereal or small mixing bowl, and lots in between.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen M. Brauning

customer_reviews.title: Put a Lid on It!
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I was skeptical when I saw these a while back and figured I'd try them. I can use these for nearly everything that requires a lid.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Juan

customer_reviews.title: My wife likes them
customer_reviews.text: They feel weird like squirmy stuff, they stretch and cling are easy to clean and they do not have to fit exactly and still hold on, anyway my wife likes them,,, the smaller sizes which are most them I dunno what you use them on.
customer_reviews.author: Praise n Complain

customer_reviews.title: These are amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I love these lids. They are very versatile, and fit all of the random containers that I already have. I got these to help cut back on using plastic wrap, and so far it's been a great success! I find they are quite stretchy, and have had no problems with ripping or tearing (I have made sure to not try to stretch them beyond their limits - I think it's pretty clear how far they will go!).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Price is logical for the product!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to cover up many things but you must be sure that the item is totaly dry. If it is wet, it does not work!
customer_reviews.author: FATMA YILDIZ

customer_reviews.title: They work great on containers sized the same
customer_reviews.text: The lids do not stay on as advertised. If it needs to stretch, it will slid off. They work great on containers sized the same, however.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: These are nice when you're to lazy to find a lid or dont have a lid that fits. I have put them on weird shaped containers and they work great. I just put them in the dishwasher and the get cleaned nicely
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: A MUST HAVE FOR ANY KITCHEN!
customer_reviews.text: These things are amazing!!! I had doubts because they looked cheap before I opened the package, however they’re AMAZING!!! They fit over EVERY one of my plastic containers that I’ve lost the lids for. I ended up throwing out about 40 plastic tops that I can never seem to match to the containers. What a great space saver. I will be ordering more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie1845

customer_reviews.title: Very good!
customer_reviews.text: It needs to dry the thing you’re covering to be able to use it .. but didn’t regret the purchase .. it’s useful anyway ..
customer_reviews.author: Esra Ghozlan

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good product
customer_reviews.text: I use them all the time. The only thing is that they dont restick when they are wet.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Kent

customer_reviews.title: These are just great!
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful. It's definitely going to save me a lot of money on Saran Wrap. I was even able to use one on a half of a watermelon. They really are great! And I do like the fact that it will also keep some of our Plastics out of the landfills and oceans.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Coffman

customer_reviews.title: Larger would be nicer.
customer_reviews.text: These lids were difficult to use. Either they wouldn't stretch enough for the container or if no stretch used it wouldn't be tight on the container. The sizes received fit small containers, which for my smalls I have lids already. I was hoping these would fit larger bowls, cereal bowl size and larger, like the shower cap type covers grandma had.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Rincon

customer_reviews.title: Handy for round bowls and fruit
customer_reviews.text: Works great for rounder things not good for rectangular dishes or items as much.
customer_reviews.author: J. Kempiak

customer_reviews.title: Sticky and Flexible
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Just a word of advice...you'll need to make sure the item you're placing this over is completely dry, otherwise it will slip. We use these on our glass mixing bowls that didn't come with lids. Also works well over cups.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: stretchable
customer_reviews.text: these work on everything that i have tried. some of my bowls are plastic with a handle and these will stretch over the handle. easy to wash and store. there are many sizes and i am happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like these
customer_reviews.text: I like these better than plastic wrap. On downside is that if you get any kind of oil on it then it won't grip.
customer_reviews.author: Asahi

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Tight seal!
customer_reviews.text: I have a cat that doesn't always finish his wet food. To prevent it from drying out, I would try to use cling wrap. It didn't always work. I loved that the covers are versatile and tight enough to cover his cat dish!
customer_reviews.author: Pegz L

customer_reviews.title: Not adjustable to bigger size containers.
customer_reviews.text: Disliked the molded shaping. The lids fit to same size containers. Not adjustable to other sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Byrd

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Buying the same kind of Lids that came with my Pyrex bowls was stupidly expensive so rather than buying those we decided to try these and they work great! They stay on well and don't move around.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Not working  as expected. But is a good invent
customer_reviews.text: I tested product when I bought it and worked well. As soon as I washed it . I couldn’t make it fit.
customer_reviews.author: claudio

customer_reviews.title: Just as described
customer_reviews.text: I've used maybe one and it seemed to be good and no spills. They are good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Selio

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to love it....
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea of this product, but it doesn’t easily stretch to cover. I tried putting it on my salad bowl. One was too small and wouldn’t stay, the other was to big. More sizes would have been better
customer_reviews.author: anna aretakis

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Work as advertised and good assortment of sizes. If stretched super tight, be careful because they split easily.
customer_reviews.author: EV

customer_reviews.title: Easy and efficient
customer_reviews.text: The product is easy to apply and the good thing is to be able to use the utensils we handle without the need to change it.
customer_reviews.author: José Leitão

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: this works great!!! don't overdo it by using it on a big bowel.
customer_reviews.author: TwoForTran

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't have to be round for it to fit
customer_reviews.text: They are what they say. They fit on items that are not round so that is nice.
customer_reviews.author: K.C Schwehr

customer_reviews.title: Super versatile on all types of bowls as a cover
customer_reviews.text: A great item and very tight leaving things fresh in the fridge for a lot longer than normal. You must be careful when leaving them on in the microwave if they are so too tight the pressure will build and they will release pressure all at once. Just a heads up here.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Rauscher

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are not easy to place on a container or to store.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solution to plastic wrap
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Wraps around cup, bowl, plate. Doesn't lay flat, if you're looking for that type of lid. Great alternative to plastic wrap.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Holladay

customer_reviews.title: I can't find anything to actually fit these on!
customer_reviews.text: I thought they would go with more sizes or my bowls. They don't fit anything I have.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: These are great and I can use them on anything that I ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great and I can use them on anything that I need to cover! They stretch and hold really well, except when wet, that is the only downside. This isn't typically an issue unless you put something in the fridge and need to uncover and cover it again after condensation builds a bit. Overall very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Olga Carbajal

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t fit anything I cook with . Disappointing but a good idea
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT COVERS
customer_reviews.text: Used this on a square container and held real tight. I was even able to pile another item on top without damaging the contents below. Definitely as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Doris

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.text: These things are great. Good for half an onion, for covering an open can, or for stretching over a bowl. Holds tight and seals well. So much better than throwing away plastic wrap.
customer_reviews.author: RR

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice but don’t stay on if item your covering is wet at all. Which is annoying to me.
customer_reviews.author: A.H.

customer_reviews.title: Little difficult
customer_reviews.text: Saw these at a trade show and thought they would be fun to use, in actuality you need a lesson to get them on and off
customer_reviews.author: Dreena Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Product is working well. I had many containers their covers are broken. These silicon covers made me use all those storage containers again. Thank You FD99
customer_reviews.author: FD99

customer_reviews.title: It looked like a good idea
customer_reviews.text: It looked like a good idea, however, the sizes are much too small. The largest one barely fits on a 10 inch salad bowl. I was very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: MarthaMary

customer_reviews.title: Not leak proof
customer_reviews.text: These slid off of everything I tried to use them on. Definitely not leak proof.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Fits prefect
customer_reviews.text: It dies what it says tried it and have been using them on my bowls that somehow the lids got lost
customer_reviews.author: texan

customer_reviews.title: User friendly and good price
customer_reviews.text: These give a good seal. I use one of the bigger ones to cover my rice cooker pot since it doesn’t have a lid and it works great! Smaller ones fit nicely over various mugs for steeping tea.
customer_reviews.author: Leeta R

customer_reviews.title: Very flexible
customer_reviews.text: I can see using these in a variety of way, I love how very flexible they are
customer_reviews.author: MonkeyMan

customer_reviews.title: Great lids for whatever
customer_reviews.text: Love these, cleaning is ok, lids are flexible but good enough.. works great on all the Tupperwares that I've used them on
customer_reviews.author: Edlyn Espinoza

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: Glad I purchased them. You can always find a size that works on any round dish or plate w/o having to transfer the food into plastic.
customer_reviews.author: CD Smith

customer_reviews.title: I don’t know
customer_reviews.text: I think once they aren’t so tight they will be better to use
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love up to the hype. They fit and hold onto anything
customer_reviews.author: NeccyQ

customer_reviews.title: Would Like to Know That the Product is NOT made in China!
customer_reviews.text: Did not. Tired of everything on Amazon coming from China. Please offer a choice!
customer_reviews.author: amazon public name

customer_reviews.title: Actually works.
customer_reviews.text: I was super surprised this actually works. I bought on a whim and now I'm glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole MItchell

customer_reviews.title: Just as described
customer_reviews.text: They work just as described, and very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: stretch lids
customer_reviews.text: Overall I am satisfied with the lids but they don' stretch quite as much as expected and could not get it to fit a square pyrex dish
customer_reviews.author: Helen A. McCallum

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Works just like they say. Had none about 9 months now and they are still in great shape
customer_reviews.author: Chapman Family

customer_reviews.title: great buy!
customer_reviews.text: These can be used on round or square containers. The several sizes makes them very versatile.
customer_reviews.author: abbe slade

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! Work great. Live them stretch as needed to fit. :)
customer_reviews.author: KAAT701

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like these lids and the sizes work out well with my containers.
customer_reviews.author: Clarice B

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Takes a little effort on some of these, but ok.
customer_reviews.author: lammie

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I use it to cover leftovers in bowls or as a substitute for my storage containers. Easy to use and convenient. Haven’t used it long or often enough to say much more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome  Lids option!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I like the two big ones but smaller one really have no use for me. Overall good product to use specially if you have bowls that no longer have lids.
customer_reviews.author: ambreen

customer_reviews.title: didn't fit on anything i tried to use
customer_reviews.text: wrote for a return. couldn't cover anything with them, they didn't fit
customer_reviews.author: Penny Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: I love them!
customer_reviews.text: These are great for use on any container, any shape, any material. They work in the microwave, don't leak. They are just as advertised!
customer_reviews.author: Laura R G

customer_reviews.title: ... a uniform way on bowls but does keep a good seal once I get it on right
customer_reviews.text: A little hard to stretch in a uniform way on bowls but does keep a good seal once I get it on right.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Huepenbecker

customer_reviews.title: ... only used one but it works well and I love the idea
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only used one but it works well and I love the idea!
customer_reviews.author: Diane Davis

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t seal well
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t seal well if there is any moisture or heat. They are not easy to stretch on as the opposite side can slip while trying to seal.
customer_reviews.author: Sherrie M.

customer_reviews.title: should be more stretchable
customer_reviews.text: not stretchable enough and does not fit most of my items
customer_reviews.author: aoufa

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Great for when you don’t wanna look for a kid that fits your Tupperware.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine L

customer_reviews.title: Good product and price
customer_reviews.text: Nice product for price. Washed well in top rack of dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: ARW

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: These lids are great! Easy to use and replaces plastic bags.
customer_reviews.author: Lise C Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Though it came in 6 different sizes, it was ...
customer_reviews.text: Though it came in 6 different sizes, it was either too small or too big for my containers that I need it to stretch over.
customer_reviews.author: Katsuhiro Furuyama

customer_reviews.title: Long live the ecology!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, easy to use! GLAD, Cling Wrap and more! Long live the ecology ...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good bye saran wrap
customer_reviews.text: They work great on many different bowls and cups !!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great Pyrex lid replacements!
customer_reviews.text: The lids to my Pyrex containers have been slowly breaking over the years. These are great as replacements! They work really well, and fit so many different sized containers.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Endres

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very versatile - just wish I could order by size
customer_reviews.author: Jan M. Salas

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and so very useful
customer_reviews.text: These conform to just about any shape container and store well as nested.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Enghusen

customer_reviews.title: No More Plastic Wrap
customer_reviews.text: Love these tops. Have saved the world from a lot of plastic already!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Auger-Kirkwood

product_meta.title: Silicone Stretch Lids (6 Pack) - Bowl Covers for Fresh Food & Leftovers to Keep Food Fresh, Durable & Stretchable Food Covers by THETIS Homes
feature_bullets: SAFE: The silicone bowl covers are made of 100% Food Grade Silicone. Those stretch lids can keep your fruit and vegetable or leftover food fresh with an air-tight seal.

WITHSTAND HIGH TEMPERATURES: The Silicone Food Covers stand up well to high temperature from -40 ℃ (-105 ℉) to 232 ℃ (450 ℉), suitable for both refrigerator and microwave oven, even safe in dishwasher.
REUSABLE FRESH KEEPER: Thetis stretch silicone lids are reusable for keeping food fresh instead of cling wrap or silver paper, in such way, to create an economic kitchen and help environment.
VERSATILE: The 6 packs perfect for 3.5"-11" containers, such as bowls, plates, containers, mason jars, mugs or cans.
EXCLUSIVE SERVICE: Backed by a 30-day replacement or refund, an 1-year warranty and lifetime customer support so you can purchase now with confidence. Please contact us via Email if any questions.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars520 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
